segments.text: Betty , would you please read this letter of application I've just written ? I'd like to have your opinion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd be glad to tell you what I think .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good ! I'm interested in your advice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I were you , I would change the beginning . You should write about your education first because we like to judge a man by his abilities .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good idea , Betty . What would you think about the second part ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it's too short . You'd better say something about your work experience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're right , I'll change it . How about the last part ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very good . But you should talk about your family , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree . I appreciate your helping me .
segments.speaker: S1
